wordpressPage.title: Food
wordpressPage.content:
We are very picky when it comes to which bands we book to the festival – and the same goes for which restaurants we choose to serve food to our audience. At the festival you can eat Norway’s best – and most environmental friendly – festival food. In 2018 we served over 100 000 portions of organic food – and almost 40% of the portions sold were meat-free.

We want to preserve our environment, and we believe that organic food production is natural part of a sustainable future. If you chose organic food, you avoid artificial additives, pesticides and industrial livestock. At the same time you are saying yes to cleaner and more healthy food, more animal welfare, a greater biodiversity and less environmentally hostile emissions. In addition, the food tastes so much better.

Since 2003 we have worked with the supervisory organ Debio. In 2013 we became the first festival in Norway who received the gold badge in organic food service – which means that over 90% of all the commodities we use are organic. In 2016 our brewery Ringnes produced Norway´s first organic beer for the festival – one year before they released it in stores. We also have an entires plastic-free food and drink serving: All food packaging is compostable (and is turned into biogas after the event) and all drinking beverages are reusable cups. This means since 2016, we have cut our use of plastic with 90%!

Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
